text: Becket is a British and American historical drama movie. It is about the historic, tumultuous relationship between King Henry II of England and his friend, the bishop Thomas Becket. It was directed by Peter Glenville and produced by Hal B. Wallis. It stars Peter O'Toole as King Henry II. It also stars John Gielgud and Richard Burton. It was released on March 11, 1964. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 12th century Category:1960s English-language movies Category:American epic movies Category:Movies about politicians Category:Movies about Christianity Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies set in England
title: Becket (movie)
